```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)

## harvey vs. water infrastrucutre blocks

harvey_blocks <- import("harvey_blocks.csv") %>% 
  rename(block1 = "block")
water_blocks <- import("water_blocks.csv") %>% 
  rename(block2 = "block")

change_blocks_hw <- harvey_blocks %>% 
  inner_join(water_blocks, by = "name") %>% 
  filter(block1 != block2)
```
